General.Name: GEM Co Ltd
General.Description: GEM Co., Ltd. operates in the recycling industry in China and internationally. The company offers nickel-cobalt-manganese and nickel-cobalt-aluminum ternary power battery materials; ultrafine cobalt-nickel powders and fine cobalt-nickel chemicals; ammonium para tungstate, recycled tungsten carbide, tungsten powder, tungsten carbide, and cemented carbide products; and other metal products, such as gold, silver, palladium, copper, and rhodium, as well as wood products for tourist attractions, indoor and outdoor places, garden landscapes, sanitation facilities, municipal engineering, and other projects. It also provides recycled plastic products, plastic wood, and other green recycled plastic products; energy storage power station, energy storage charging station, power backup, UPS, portable energy storage, and home energy storage battery products; lithium-ion battery systems for aerial work platforms, forklift batteries, etc.; batteries for sightseeing cars, two wheelers, tricycles, etc.; and black, copper, and aluminum powders. In addition, the company engages in the electronic waste, end-of-life vehicle, new energy material, and environmental management businesses. Further, it offers ternary precursor and cathode materials; cobalt oxide, powder, flake, and carbonate products; lithium cobaltate and nickel products; and crushed WEEE and scrap car materials. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Green Eco-manufacture Hi-tech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to GEM Co., Ltd. in April 2015. GEM Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Menggang  Mu
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO & Acting Sec. of the Board of Directors
